overview: Andre Nickatina Presents: 'Ugly Money' a film written, directed and starring Gino Carnell as Mack, a smooth talking pimp and his two ladies, Carmela (Lucia Reveles) and Amber (Amanda Colmen). This movie takes the audience on a journey through the trials and tribulations of modern urban survival with sharp edged insightfulness. The soundtrack features YukMouth, Andre Nickatina, Equipto and G-Noc.
title: Ugly Money
